"Le mie app "

Immettere l\'Indirizzo IP della telecamera e premere il pulsante OK per accedere alla pagina del produttore della telecamera.\nFare clic sul collegamento Web in basso a sinistra su una normale pagina Web.
In modalità DHCP, l\'elenco IP salvato non viene applicato.

Si è verificato un timeout di rete. Si prega di verificare la connessione e riprovare.
Il nome non è stato inserito
Ha lo stesso nome. Per favore inserisci un altro nome.
Modalità
Configurazione Ethernet
Chiaro
Nome Inserisci …
Add
Si prega di verificare di nuovo l\'indirizzo IP.
Network camera can be easily connected by PoE(Power of Ethernet, 30W) power supply.
To connect network camera, network setting of the monitor should be completed.
Network cameras that support ONVIF can be connected by searching IP address. If ONVIF is not supported, IP address should be entered manually.
"If the IP address of searched camera and IP address range of monitor is different, the IP address of the monitor should be changed same as the camera's. "
"If you lost your camera account information, you should initialize the camera first and connect it. If you need to set a camera account, you can use web browser to set it. "
You can select the profile that the camera has and output video as desired resolution, and record and capture it.
You can connect HD-SDI, 3G-SDI and EX-SDI camera to check video.
You can check the signal status of connected camera with Level Meter function.
You can check the focus depth by measuring the focus status of connected camera with Focus meter function.
You can check whether the input signal has problem or not with CRC Check function.
You can adjust PTZ and OSD by RS-485, and check and analyze input data.
The camera supports EX-SDI UCC is able to adjust PTZ and OSD with connected coaxial cable.
You can record and capture the input video.
You can check video by connecting AHD, TVI, CVI, CVBS camera.
You can check connected camera status with Level Meter function.
You can measure the focus status of connected camera to check focus depth with Focus Meter function.
You can adjust PTZ and OSD with connected coaxial cable.
You can record and capture the input video.
You can check video and audio when connected to HDMI input port.
The video currently displayed is output as 1080p 60Hz when connected to HDMI output port.
You can record and capture the input video.
TDRC - Coaxial cable length measurement
Measure the length of the connected coaxial cable.
More accurate length measurement is available when cable type is selected.
If cable length is displayed abnormal, please try the measurement again.
TDRU - UTP cable length measurement
Measure the length of the connected UTP cable.
Measured status value may vary depending on the cable wiring types.
"Reflectance loss rate may displayed larger depending on the quality of the cable. "
If the cable not measured properly, please refer to the cable diagram and check the wiring status.
My Apps
Display all apps installed in the product.
You can use Playstore to download and use an app.
Packet Test
Create packet data to send or receive.
IP address and port should be set and network should be established
App Update
"You can update the apps installed in the product. "
Available when Wi-Fi or LAN is connected.
Quick Menu
Gallery : You can check the saved image and video file.
File Manager : You can move or copy data to an external disk.
"User's Manual : You can find help regarding monitor operation. "
IP Browser : You can access camera page or regular web browser by entering IP address.
Ethernet Setting : You can quickly reset by saving frequently used ethernet information.

"External Device Off : When data is saved in Micro SD card or USB, removing external device without using this function may result data loss. Please make sure to release external device before removing it. "
Do you disable the External devices?
Remove external devices
